pr_title: Run TenantsMaintainer when use-tenant-meta-data feature flag is true

timeline.message: Run TenantsMaintainer when use-tenant-meta-data feature flag is true

timeline.bodyText: So this turns off all deletion for zones where the metadata is not used. I guess that's OK?
timeline.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: Yes, the maintainer has been turned off for a long time, since it turned out that we needed more metadata to be able to safely delete unused tenants
replies.author: hmusum
